GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an array of all reviews for a given review_id

review.title: Jenga
review.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a given review_id

comments.body: Not sure about dogs, but my cat likes to get involved with board games, the boxes are their particular favourite
comments.author: philippaclaire9

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: to post a comment for a given review_id and request body with username & body

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: to update votes in reviews by the value provided in the request body

review.title: Jenga
review.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
